about_the_game:
Play as a Computer Virus that can take control of any robot, your mission is to DESTROY THEM ALL!



Gameplay Summary
The concept of fights is turned upside down in this first person Arena Shooter with fast, fluid movement and satisfying gunplay. Use a variety of unique weapons to dispatch of your enemies. The main mechanic is that you can take control of any enemy, letting you stay alive in whatever body you want, there is no healing, so if you are low on health, youll have to take control of an enemy that has better health than you...... or a better weapon.



Story:
The Year is 2132,
A robotics company called "Omnitronics" has taken control of the world, government after government fell to the hands of Omnitronics, their goals are unclear as of yet, but its known for certain that their intentions are not good, given their track record...





A young computer scientist who lost his father in a "work incident" one day after handing in his resignation to Omnitronics, has dedicated his life to taking down the company for all the things that they do. He made a virus, the "Omni-Virus" that in theory should be able to enter through the companies servers and start to take it down from the inside, using their own electionics against them. You play as this virus.....



Gameplay
A Fast paced movement shooter focused on a mechanic of being able to become any electronic in order to end your enemies.. or sometimes avoid them. A combination of classic FPS features we have grown to love over the years, and brand new unique mechanics and features in order to give you the most unique experience. Omnipresence is not trying to fit into the traditional "FPS" standards, and deviates to try new things which breath a breath or fresh air into a sometimes stale and repetitive genre.

You will be able to upgrade your virus throughout your playthrough in order to unlock new abilities and be able to turn into stronger electonics.

Take part in some very interesting puzzles that make use of the mechanic.

Progress through the levels as you get closer and closer to shutting down the server the robots run on, your one and only goal is to destroy all of them, from the INSIDE!
